newsitem.title: CHINA: Hangzhou-Ningbo freeway opens to traffic.
newsitem.headline: Hangzhou-Ningbo freeway opens to traffic.

text.p: A new freeway linking the east China coastal city of Ningbo with Hangzhou in the west opened to traffic on Friday, the Liberation Daily said on Saturday.
The 145 km-long road is an important part of the growing highway network in the Yangtze Delta area with Shanghai at its centre, the newspaper said.
